meanings.definition: Having a wide range of habitats or environments.
meanings.sent1: The euryokous bird could be found in forests, deserts, and even near water.
meanings.sent2: The euryokous plant thrived in both sunny and shady areas of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The euryokous squirrel seemed to enjoy exploring all kinds of different trees.
meanings.sent4: Her euryokous nature allowed her to feel at home in any city she visited.
meanings.sent5: The euryokous butterfly danced gracefully from flower to flower, adapting to each new environment.

meanings.definition: Capable of adapting to various conditions.
meanings.sent1: The euryokous chameleon changed its colors to blend in with different backgrounds.
meanings.sent2: Being euryokous, the fish could survive in both freshwater and saltwater.
meanings.sent3: The euryokous cat was equally content indoors and outdoors, enjoying the best of both worlds.
meanings.sent4: His euryokous mind could easily switch between tasks, adapting to any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The euryokous athlete excelled in various sports, showing adaptability in every competition.
